title: 70 years at Brunswick Baths
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
abstract: Brunswick - Meet Harry Ivory, 84 year old boxing legend.
description: Brunswick - Harry Ivory, a fitness fanatic, a boxer, boxing trainer and local legend has been attending the Brunswick Baths since the day it opened in 1928. Part of a longer documentary about Harry's life, this 4 minute film was made especially for the MAP project and focuses on the importance to him of the Brunswick Baths and the Baths community. Harry loves the place and often says it is the Baths that keep him going.
